bio: Senior Software Engineer at Meta focusing on scalable backend systems and real-time messaging. Launched a low-latency event bus used across 3 products; plays trumpet and bikes to work. Interested in distributed tracing, SRE, and product-led performance wins.

Computer Science student at UW building full‑stack startups. Built an indie ticketing app with serverless functions and Stripe; coffeeshop connoisseur and weekend open-water swimmer. Loves cloud infra and developer experience.
Staff Engineer (Payments) who designed a fraud-detection pipeline that reduced false positives by 27%. Cat parent, amateur ceramicist, and obsessed with data pipelines and ML feature stores.
Senior SWE at a fintech startup; led migration from monolith to microservices and cut deploy times in half. Enjoys climbing, synthwave playlists, and building low-cost telemetry for legacy systems.
Recent grad and ML engineering intern turned full-time at a health-tech company. Co-authored an internal model that speeds diagnosis triage; avid baker and fixture at local hackathons.
Engineering Manager who started as a frontend dev. Runs a mentorship program, prototypes UX-first tooling, and plays trombone in a community jazz band. Passionate about accessibility and performance.
Mobile dev (iOS) who shipped an AR shopping feature. Former design student who loves pixel-perfect interfaces, pattern libraries, and long-distance running.
Infrastructure Engineer who architected a multi-region Kubernetes platform and contributed tools to reduce incident toil. Amateur beekeeper and weekend violinist.
Data Engineer obsessed with clean schemas and observability. Built a CDC pipeline to sync legacy databases to a lakehouse; sketches portraits for fun.
Senior SWE specializing in graphics and real-time rendering. Implemented a GPU-accelerated compositor; loves retro games and microcontroller projects.
Product Engineer who shipped analytics features used by 10k+ customers. Dabbles in generative art and mentors high-school coders on weekends.
Back-end engineer at a cloud provider focused on cost-efficient storage systems. Runs a tiny cookbook blog and organizes local hack nights.
Student (CS) building an accessible note-taking app. Interested in human-centered ML and UX for neurodiverse users; teaches skateboarding to kids.
Full-stack engineer who built a privacy-first chat prototype; previously interned at a security firm. Collects mechanical keyboards and experiments with async Rust.
Senior SWE (Search) who improved query latency and relevance. Hosts a book club about systems design and bakes extraordinary tarts during sprints.
DevOps engineer who automated CI/CD across 12 microservices. Weekend salsa dancer and maker of elaborate spreadsheets to track project health.
Software Engineer interested in edge computing and IoT. Built a low-power sensor network for urban gardens; paints watercolors in her free time.
SRE who enjoys forensic debugging and incident write-ups. Runs an open-source pagerduty-style playbook and coaches high-school robotics teams.
Algorithm engineer working on recommendation systems. Built an explainability toolkit for stakeholders and collects vintage cameras.
Machine Learning engineer focused on productionizing models at scale. Loves long-distance cycling and contributing to open-source optimization libs.
Frontend engineer and design systems advocate. Rewrote a component library used across three teams; hosts a podcast about creative tooling.
Startup CTO who built a telemetry stack from scratch; moonlights as a DJ and mentors founders on product-market fit.
Student researcher in HCI designing collaborative VR tools. Co-authored a paper on shared spatial annotations and runs a small coffee-roasting side hustle.
Security engineer who spearheaded threat-hunting automation. Amateur astronomer and builds secure firmware for hobby hardware projects.
Senior PM turned SWE—bridges product and engineering for mobile experiences. Organized a citywide coding sprint and coaches youth soccer.
